title: ISic000760. I.Sicily inscription 000760
body:
1Diis Manibus [sacrum?] personal name
2amicae carissi[mae sepulcrum et mo-]
3nimentum fe[ci ---]
4quae a pluribus [heredibus non haben-]
5[tu]r ex eis unus b[enemerens---]
[---]

1DIISMANIBUS[......]PERSONALNAME
2AMICAECARISSI[................]
3NIMENTUMFE[..---]
4QUAEAPLURIBUS[.................]
5[..]REXEISUNUSB[.........---]
[---]

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

Text from Manganaro 1989 (187 no.73 fig.78)

English translation

James Hua

(Sacred?) to the gods of the underworld. I,..., made this tomb and monument for my dearest friend..., who was not succeeded by any heirs, from among them one was worthy...

commentary
